channel.title: Help please

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Search for <img=0>Ardi or <img=1>Ardi server sided…
Or even just search for “Ardi” server sided.

The reason it isn’t working client sided is because the text is forced over your text on the interface via the server. Hint: packet 126.

item.description:
